original_title: Rusty Rivets: Botasaur and the Bits
overview: Go nuts and bolt into 8 adventures with Rusty's hilarious robotic helpers! Whether they're getting souped up with rockets to solve a mystery or geared up as police officers to save the day, Botasaur and the Bits put the fun into any fix!  INCLUDES: Rusty's Bits on the Fritz Rusty Digs In Rusty's Brave Cave Save Rusty's Water Works Rusty and the Bit Police Rusty's Bota-fort Rusty's Pet Project Rusty Loses the Bits
title: Rusty Rivets: Botasaur and the Bits
